subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: ObjectLedge Maven plugin was created in order to automate some tasks performed during development of applications. We use Maven for developing ObjectLedge and our ObjectLedge applications so this was the most convinien solution.

In the future the plugin will conain infrastructure necessary to embed an ObjectLedge container in Maven, and expose any Pico-compatible components as Jelly tags. This way users will be able to use their components in yet another environment, writting very little glue code.
